reviewText: Wonderful instrumental music on this video, great holiday scenes with slow camera pan and a nice mix of close and more distant shots. Trees, poinsettias, outdoor shots, even light snowfall on pines.

Another DVD that was supposed to be about Xmas history of traditions and their origins. Instead, it's a Xmas music video with cool scenes and great music. Bobby likes it so I'm happy and it arrived in time for his 14 December birthday. DVD in mint condition.
We watched the whole thing. Better if your high
More beautiful Christmas music for the holidays.  Thank you Amazon!
Beautiful high quality video and music to back it up.  I'll have this on in the background at holiday events this year.
Really nice but seriously flawed: no music credits. Desperately trying to remember the name of the song played over the poinsettia clips... and nothing! Anybody know the one I mean???
Loved it.  What a great relaxing way to spend Christmas. Friends family and this on low in the background.  Music is good too
I already own this wonderful DVD & my mom loved it so much, that I bought her one too! Beautiful music & images that is perfect to put on when company comes over
Captures beautiful holiday scenes and the music is soft & serene.
Too slow and repetitive is you're actually watching, but the ambiance...
So enjoyable!  Definitely ushers in the Christmas cheer!
great old music for the holidays
Really nice background music and images.
